name: Dice Roller - 21
description:
Made in a handful of hours (life does really likes to get in the way), really quite sparse on actual content, but serves as a proof of concept.

Goal

The goal is to collect 21 dots and reach the end point. Oh and it's timed (but no panic, completion time does not directly impact gameplay)

Whilst it is possible to use any combination of dice to collect those dots, for most levels (bar the second one) they should all be possible by only collecting one of each die.

Progress (best, e.g. lowest) level time and current level is saved when progressing between levels.

To start a fresh, delete the save01.bin file in the same folder as the executable (this will delete current level progress as well as personal high scores).

Controls KeyActionEscape(From Gameplay) Pause, (From Pause Menu) UnpauseEnter(From Main Menu) StartSpaceJumpLeft ArrowMove LeftRight ArrowMove RightRReset Level
